t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    (n, k) = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    total = sum(p)
    res = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if p[i] > k:
            p[i] = k
    s2 = sum(p)
    print(total - s2)

for i in range(int(input())):
    (items, value) = map(int, input().split())
    lis = list(map(int, input().split()))
    initial = sum(lis)
    after = sum([min(i, value) for i in lis])
    print(initial - after)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, p) = map(int, input().split(' '))
    l = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))[:n]
    c = 0
    k = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if l[i] > p:
            c = c + p
            k = k + l[i]
        else:
            c = c + l[i]
            k = k + l[i]
    print(k - c)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    l = [int(k - int(i)) for i in input().split() if int(i) > k]
    print(abs(sum(l)))

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    p = list(map(int, input().split()))
    i = 0
    loss = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if p[i] > k:
            loss += p[i] - k
    print(loss)
    t -= 1
